original_title: The World of Pulses - Electronics and Living Organism
overview: Cameraman Yonesaku Kobayashi (1905-2005) is a pioneer of scientific films of Japan. He and producer Sozo Okada made many scientific educational films, and in 60's - 70's, many avant-garde composers composed music for these films.
title: The World of Pulses - Electronics and Living Organism
